ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: Sanjeevani is a group of professionals which caters to the marginalised population with focus on women and children. after the inception of the society it has been functioning on various platforms for improving local governance professionalising youths rehabilitating displaced and abandoned children empowering women and sensitising communities on conservation of enviournemnt. Sanjeevani also functions with out reach programmes family tracing home placement training for self employment motivational classess self developement support programmes in ovservation homes and shelterhomems goverment and childcare centres. we are also emphasis on programmes of audio visual presentations value based educations motivational classes basic literacy classes coaching classes counselling for both client and family members. in addition to we also streamlining to the society and family job oriented training celebration of all national are the routine activities designed for street children. Udaan is another venture of sanjeevani started in chindwara district with three sub centres. in collaboration with janpad panchayat and chavara academy of cmi seva sangh we provide services to physically challenged children youth and adults. skill training medical treatment corrective surgery counselling certification of persons with disability vocational rehabilitation camps anthyodaya mela cancer mukti campaign are some of the outstanding programmes and activities of the institute. we also run rural English medium school named sanjeevani vidhyapeeth for poor tribal children with quality and value education. in addition we organise rural awareness camps to focus on women empowerment and holistic development of the respective tribal villages. we also provide multi skill training for girls.
